{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking about the rule that gives the sequence of fractures. In forensic medicine, Puppe's rule is used to determine the sequence of fractures. It states that a second fracture will not cross an existing one. Therefore, the sequence of fractures can be determined by observing which fracture lines are uninterrupted and which ones are not.", "answer_choice": "B. Puppe's rule"}
